text: The 1934 Tour de Hongrie was the ninth edition of the Tour de Hongrie cycle race and was held from 26 to 30 June 1934. The race started and finished in Budapest. The race was won by Károly Szenes. ==Route== {| class="wikitable" |+ Stages of the 1934 Tour de Hongrie |- ! scope="col" | Stage ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Route ! scope="col" | Distance ! scope="col" | Winner |- ! scope="col" | 1 | style="text-align:right;" | 26 June | Budapest to Miskolc | | |- ! scope="col" | 2 | style="text-align:right;" | 27 June | Miskolc to Debrecen | | |- ! scope="col" | 3 | style="text-align:right;" | 28 June | Debrecen to Budapest | | |- ! scope="col" | 4 | style="text-align:right;" | 29 June | Budapest to Tapolca | | |- ! scope="col" | 5 | style="text- align:right;" | 30 June | Tapolca to Budapest | | |- | colspan="3" style="text-align:center" | Total | colspan="2" style="text-align:center" | '''''' |} ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | MTK | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | Hungary A | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 25" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | UTE | style="text-align:right;" | + 2' 04" |} |} ==References== 1934 Tour de Hongrie Tour de Hongrie
